topSection.me: I'm Julia, nice to have you here!

section.title: UX/UI Design
section.content: I do UX/UI design to make applications more usable and look friendlier. I also design and develop websites. Thanks to my studies, I have background knowledge from software development, which simplifies the planning and implementation of new interaction concepts and interfaces.

section.title: Fine Art - Shapes and colors
section.content: My art focuses on colors and shapes mostly created with acrylics and watercolors. I travel a lot and paint in nature, so I also like to use materials from the environment, such as sand and leaves. See more images on <link1>@julia_farbe</link1>

exhibitions.title: Exhibitions
exhibitions.content: I exhibited for the first time as part of <link1>Kunst aus vielen HÃ¤nden</link1>. I find the exchange with other artists and people interested in art very exciting, so I am already looking forward to the next opportunity to exhibit.
exhibitions.KaterMurr: The next exhibition will begin on March 21, 2023 at Kater Murr in Nuremberg during the opening hours of the bar. The pictures will then remain hanging for a few weeks. I am very happy about your visit.

section.title: Digital Art, Illustrations & Monster
section.content: In the field of digital design, I develop fonts, logos and illustrations. I prefer to work with Sketchbook and Procreate. Among the illustrations, I particularly liked the monsters, which has resulted in a small collection over time: 'Monsters for every situation'. Find more monsters under <link1>@monster.star.moon</link1>

section.title: About me
section.personal: I am Julia. I love to paint and design analogue as well as digital. Unfortunately, I also like to travel and climb. I always have a pen and notebook with me. If space allows, the colors will be included.
section.professional: I am a self-taught designer and artist. I studied computer science of media at the Technical University of Dresden. The course expanded my creative scope to the digital world and deepened my knowledge of software development. Finde my CV on <link1>LinkedIn</link1>.
section.claim: I love to plan and implement new ideas analogously or digitally and to accompany existing projects creatively and energetically.
